casebody.data:
In the Matter of C.N.R. No. 368P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 6, 2006. Terry F. Rose, Smithfield, for Margaret and Brandon J. Susan J. Hall, for Father. W.A. Holland, Smithfield, Jennifer S. O'Connor, for Johnston County DSS. James Johnson, for Guardian ad Litem.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of July 2006 by Respondent (Mother) to Dismiss Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of November 2006."
